tool_description: Executes seamless quality transitions during video playback by managing segment requests and synchronizing bitrate changes with minimal viewer disruption.

target_quality_kbps.description: Target quality to switch to in kbps

switch_timing.description: When to execute switch: immediate, next_segment, or next_keyframe

error_messages: Invalid quality values: Both current and target quality must be positive integers
Invalid segment position: Must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Same quality switch: Current and target quality cannot be identical
usage: Specify current and target qualities with switch timing preference. The tool manages the transition to minimize playback disruption.

switch_executed.description: Whether the quality switch was successfully executed

actual_switch_time_ms.description: Actual time taken to complete the switch

switch_type.description: Type of switch performed: upgrade, downgrade, or lateral
